prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with bright red and orange colors and large mushroom features.
Imagine a forest-dwelling Pokemon with a round body and crab-like claws.
Generate a small Pokemon that has a unique mushroom shell and is often found in caves.
Show me an insect-like creature with vibrant colors and a playful personality.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a crab with distinctive mushroom growths on its back.
Make a tiny Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a unique color pattern.
Give me a Pokemon that has a mix of red and brown colors and an unusual body shape.
